title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, requirements, timeline, and resources needed. Set up project management tools and processes.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, define user personas, gather functional and non-functional requirements for the VirtualPetCompanion app. This task includes identifying key features, interactions, and potential challenges in augmented reality environment, with a focus on usability, accessibility, and performance considerations.

title: System Architecture Design for VirtualPetCompanion (Updated)
description: Update the overall system architecture design for the Virtual Pet Companion app. This includes the AR component, backend services, data storage, and integration with external APIs if required. Emphasize scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Strive for modularity, flexibility, and adaptability to future enhancements. Review dependencies, timelines, and potential impacts on each component. Provide a detailed design plan including architecture diagrams where appropriate (Additionally, consider edge cases and error handling mechanisms). If necessary, suggest possible technologies and tools that could be used in the implementation. This RFC is intended for review, approval, and further task decomposition.

title: UI/UX Design for VirtualPetCompanion app: Final Draft
description: Finalize the user interface and user experience design for the VirtualPetCompanion app, including AR interactions, gamification elements, accessibility considerations, responsive design, and incorporate feedback from team members. Collaborate with the team to ensure all aspects align with the project's vision and goals.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services, including pet behavior simulation, user data management, and integration with third-party services (if needed).

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the VirtualPetCompanion app's frontend, including AR integration, UI components, and gamification features.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, pet data, interactions, achievements, and other relevant information. Consider data normalization, indexing, and scalability requirements. Implement data access layer with appropriate caching mechanisms. Include support for real-time data updates using a technology like Firebase or similar. Also, consider the use of NoSQL databases due to their flexibility in handling semi-structured data.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure the app's compliance with relevant privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, write test cases, and perform various types of testing (unit, integration, end-to-end, performance, etc.) to ensure the app's quality.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, configure infrastructure and environments, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create user guides, FAQs, and other supporting documentation. Set up user support channels and processes.
